main.name: Resham Jhangiani
main.bio: Hey there! I'm a software engineer who enjoys working at the intersection of engineering and design. I build websites and applications that provide intuitive,scalable and efficient behind the scenes.For the past year, I've been working on my Masters degree in Computer science, developing skills in web development and constantly learning and updating with new tecnologies. Lately I have been concentrating on big data analytics with Hadopp and distributed computing.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.description: Concentrating towards distributed systems, hadoop stack and full stack development

programminglanguages: C  ,  C++  ,  Python ,    Java ,  HTML , CSS , JavaScript (ES6), SQL
tools: Git , Eclipse ,  NetBeans ,  Google Chrome ,  Bash
hpc: MPI , NVIDIA CUDA , Map Reduce, HDFS ,Spark

projects.name: Recognition and Classification System with Deep Learning and machine
projects.description: An advanced system that is able to (i) Recognize and classify objects in real time, images, video (ii) Facialrecognition among trained data set.

projects.name: BI Visualization
projects.description: The website enables users to plugin data files in form of json/xml/excel sheets and apply runtime business analytics tools and visualize data using D3js charts and graphs for identifying hidden insights in data

projects.name: Emotion Recognition in Text using Information Retrieval Rules & Machine Learning
projects.description: Developed a supervised machine learning classifier capable of predicting and classifying human emotions in textdata. The intermediate input to the algorithm was initially processed by NLP tools and customized Information retrieval rules.

projects.name: Click Stream Data Analysis
projects.description: Analysis of Wikipedia clickstream data, to generate heat maps displaying most viewed Zones of the website.

projects.name: Library Management System
projects.description: A library management software integrated with SQL for CRUD data operations
